events.message: The applicant submitted the personal loan application to cover upcoming medical expenses and consolidate existing debt for better management.
The application was categorised under Personal Loan as it mentions medical and debt repayment purposes in the initial documentation.
Loan officer Sarah James was assigned to manage and oversee the loan application process and assist the applicant.
The initial review of the submitted documents was conducted to ensure completeness and verify the stated reasons for the loan.
Additional documents including recent payslips and medical bills were requested to validate the income and expenses claimed.
The applicant promptly submitted the requested payslips and medical documentation to support the loan application.
Credit check was conducted revealing a stable credit history with some existing credit card balances within acceptable limits.
Risk assessment concluded that the applicant’s financial situation is manageable and repayment capacity is adequate given current obligations.
An offer for a Personal Loan was presented to the applicant including terms, interest rate, and repayment schedule tailored to their needs.
The applicant provided positive feedback on the proposed loan terms and requested minor adjustments to the repayment timeline.
The application was escalated to the senior loan committee for approval due to the requested modifications in repayment terms.
The senior loan committee approved the personal loan with the requested repayment schedule adjustments and no additional conditions.
The loan amount was successfully disbursed into the applicant’s bank account to cover medical and debt consolidation expenses.
A follow-up call was conducted to ensure the applicant received funds and to offer assistance with any questions about repayment.
The loan application process was officially closed after successful funding and initial positive feedback from the applicant.
